channel.title: Quantic Dream's (Heavy Rain) "Kara" tech demo
channel.description:
http://www.gametrailers.com/video/gdc-2012-quantic-dream/727752 http://www.gametrailers.com/video/gdc-2012-quantic-dream/727754
It's rather strange, but I'm glad Sony still fund these sorts of developers. Not that fussed about just creating a guaranteed multimillion seller, but with letting their developers do something new. Heavy Rain didn't sell that well, and it wasn't perfect, but it was a good idea that just wasn't executed on as well as it could have been.
You could argue this is the reason Sony are in such shit at the moment, but the PlayStation division returned to profitability after the disastrous launch, so I guess games like Uncharted selling the millions allows them to do these more risky projects on the side.
But yeah, this is only a tech demo. But the last tech demo in 2006 these guys did turned into Heavy Rain, so it could turn into something.

item.title: Quantic Dream's (Heavy Rain) "Kara" tech demo
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I like how it looks, is it far ahead of technology used in today’s games? I’m used to old games, because my computers can’t run the newer ones. So I have no idea what games today actually look like.

Read full topic
